question: What does FCSSIP25 stand for?

options.A: Federal Civil Service Strategy and Implementation Plan 2021–2025
options.B: Federal Consolidated Social Safety Investment Programme 2021–2025
options.C: Federal Civil Servants Salary Improvement Proposal 2025
options.D: Federal Council for Sustainable Infrastructure Plan 2025

question: Which body primarily coordinates the civil service reforms under FCSSIP25?

options.A: Office of the Head of the Civil Service of the Federation

question: How many strategic pillars are identified in FCSSIP25?
Which pillar focuses on building skills and leadership pipelines across the service?
Which pillar institutionalises the use of KPIs and evidence‑based appraisal?
Which initiative strengthens payroll integrity and eliminates ghost workers?

options.A: IPPIS (Integrated Payroll and Personnel Information System)

question: Which reform area promotes ideation, prototyping and scaling of solutions within MDAs?
Which pillar drives automated workflows and electronic records across MDAs?
Which pillar improves the value proposition to civil servants (e.g., health, housing, incentives)?
Which civil service core value emphasises fairness in appointments and promotion?
Which core value requires honesty and truthfulness in conduct?
Which core value demands competence, etiquette and ethical delivery?
What citizen‑facing outcome is expected by 2025 under FCSSIP25?
Which instrument links individual outputs to MDA goals?
Which governance tool consolidates government revenues into a single account for transparency?
Which structure serves as the ‘engine room’ for reforms within an MDA?
What is the purpose of Service Charters in MDAs?

options.A: To publish service standards and timelines to citizens

question: Which statement best captures the mission orientation of FCSSIP25?

options.A: Deliver quality public services to Nigerians

question: Which practice aligns with a performance culture under FCSSIP25?

options.B: Promotion by length of service only

question: Which item is a documented achievement area mentioned in the FCSSIP25 context?
Which mechanism provides real‑time visibility of reform milestones across MDAs?
Which programme accelerates leadership grooming for high‑potential officers?
Which training stream targets all grades through blended learning?
Which system centralises HR records and processes across the Service?
Which value discourages impunity and unethical behaviour?
Which expected result improves document retrieval and reduces file loss?
What best demonstrates ownership of reforms by civil servants?

options.A: Driving implementation at unit and departmental levels
